name: Labyrinth of Souls (Remastered)
description:
WARNING: This is an intense experience and may not be for everyone.

Can you escape the Labyrinth of Souls, or are you doomed to be trapped forever with the ancient guardians that are hunting you down?  Can you break the seals that are locking you in?  Brave the terrifying labyrinth and find out for yourself if you have what it takes.

Labyrinth of Souls is a first person horror experience where you travel through a labyrinth maze infested with ancient guardians who will hunt you down if you aren't careful.  If you can get the keeper what he asks for, perhaps he will show you the way out.

Originally created in 72 hours for the 44th Ludum Dare game jam (play it here), Labyrinth of Souls has been updated with improved visuals, haunting and terrifying audio and guardians so terrifying, you may forget you're playing a game.  This is a simple, straightforward experience, but should be challenging even for the experienced gamer.

If you enjoyed this game, please let me know.  You can comment on the project here, or you can tweet me @jharler_dev or shoot me an email jharler@gmail.com.  If you make a let's play, please share it with me.  I love watching them.  I've created this game entirely on my own over the past couple of weeks with little input from others, so constructive criticism is welcome.  Help me improve this game!
